resources.string: The widget needs to know where you are to calculate the location of the Sun in the sky.\n\nPlease allow access to the device\'s precise location.

Sometimes home screen widget updates happen while there\'s another app running. You need to allow the location permission all the time to ensure there\'s always up-to-date data visible when you see it.\n\nPlease select the “%1$s” option in the next screen to allow this widget to update while not visible.
Please enable your device Location in the Settings app by tapping here. After coming back, wait a moment to allow the system to figure things out.
The widget needs to know where you are to calculate the location of the Sun in the sky.\nPlease allow access to the precise location in the app Settings by tapping here.

Sometimes home screen widget updates happen while there\'s another app running and the widget is not visible.\nPlease allow access to the precise location permission in the app Settings using the “%1$s“ option by tapping here.
Can\'t start Settings app, sorry.\n\nPlease go to device Settings to manually enable location or permissions.
The widget needs to know where you are, however due to performance reasons it will not request a location. Please open Maps or other app that shows your location.
